product_name: McNett Gore-Tex Fabric Repair Kit II - Taslan
long_description: For quick outerwear fixes in the field, the McNett Gore-Tex(R) Fabric repair kit does the trick and keeps you from getting wet. Kit includes 2 Gore-Tex(R)/Taslan(R) nylon fabric pre-cut patches with easy press-on application. Includes 1 3.9 x 2 in. rectangular patch and 1 3 in. circular patch. Once your return home, use an iron to increase the bond strength and wear life of the patch. Patch can be easily removed when the time comes for a permanent repair.
short_description: For quick outerwear fixes in the field, the McNett Gore-Tex(R) Fabric repair kit does the trick and keeps you from getting wet.
